Description.val:
This budget exhibit represents a considerable departure from PB17 and prior submissions.  Many of the field changes and upgrades previously included in P40A Cost Elements have been broken out into separate P3A Cost Elements in order to capture individual procurement and installation costs of specific field changes and upgrades. This change results in significant changes from PB17.  In addition, FY16 amounts reflect current actuals and P3A installation plans reflect current system fielding plans. 

This program provides procurement and improvements of navigation equipment to include Inertial Navigation equipment for Ballistic Missile Defense such as gyrocompasses, speed sensors, Electronic Chart Display and Information System - Navy (ECDIS-N) and major components for other navigation systems.  ECDIS-N provides Fleet-wide electronic charting capability, increases navigation and situational awareness, improves safety at sea, and eliminates reliance on paper charts.  These systems provide mission critical navigation data to Ballistic Missile Defense, shipboard, combat, and gun and missile systems.

[P40A / GW013: CONVENTIONAL NAVIGATION FIELD CHANGE KITS]: Use of this Cost Element ends with FY16 and future planned efforts have been moved to associated product-specific P3A Cost Elements for FY17 and beyond.  For FY16 and prior, these funds are required to procure Navigation Field Change Kits for reliability and maintainability improvements and corrections for various conventional navigation equipment including the Dead Reckoning Equipment (DRE), Computer Aided Dead Reckoning Tracer (CADRT), plotters, gyrocompasses, Electromagnetic Log (EM Log), Doppler Sonar Velocity Log (DSVL), Digital Flux Gate Magnetic Compass, Digital Depth Detector and Synchronization Signal Amplifier. These improvements are required to keep Fleet-installed equipment operating to a basic level.  This cost element funds multiple Field Changes of various quantities, costs, and fielding plans.

[P40A / GW029: INERTIAL NAVIGATION SYSTEMS FIELD CHANGE KITS]: Use of this Cost Element ends with FY16 and future planned efforts have been moved to associated product-specific P3A Cost Elements for FY17 and beyond.  For FY16 and prior, these funds are required in order to support procurement and implementation of Engineering Change Proposals (ECPs)/ Field Change (FC) Kits, alterations and update of associated technical documentation which provide reliability and maintainability improvements, corrections and upgrades for various Inertial Navigation Systems (INS), (AN/WSN-7/7A/7B), the associated IP-1747 Control Display Unit  (CDU), and IP-1747 Enhanced Control Display Unit (ECDU) and Aircraft Inertial Alignment System (AIAS) (AN/SRC-40, OU-174, TS-3543A).  Funds also support procurement of hardware and software changes to the navigation suite required to integrate with Ring Laser Gyro Navigator (AN/WSN-7/7A), and Ring Laser Gyrocompass (AN/WSN-7B) and Test & Integration.  Funds will support technology refresh to replace parts obsolescence and keep pace with technology.  Funds required to perform navigation certification required as prerequisite to TOMAHAWK certification.  This cost element funds multiple Field Changes of various quantities, costs, and fielding plans.

[P40A / GW038: BPS ECDIS-N/VMS FC KITS:]: These funds are required to provide AN/BPS-15/16 - Voyage Management System (VMS) Field Changes to provide ECDIS-N capability and to support obsolescence replacement on submarines.

[P40A / GW051:  SCALABLE ECDIS-N ECP/FIELD CHANGE KITS:]: This Cost Element was transitioned from P40A to P3A to capture specific fielding of ECDIS-N hardware and software upgrades. These funds are required for the procurement and installation of ECDIS-N ECP/Field Change Kits to support hardware tech refresh, software upgrades to incorporate latest functions and safety enhancements, obsolescence replacement, and for engineering services associated with interfacing systems on multiple platforms.

[P40A / GW054: NAVIGATION TRAINING EQUIPMENT]: Funds are required for the procurement of training equipment for multiple Navigation classrooms in support of Navigation System Technician pipeline training and ECDIS-N Operator Training.  This includes computer upgrades and software licenses.  These upgrades are critical to maintaining Fleet proficiency on operation and maintenance of navigation systems.  Field Changes include ECDIS-N Operator Course Classroom Tech Refresh and additional seats and licenses and upgrade/update Mariner Skills Simulator (MSS) to support Fleet Training Requirements (Radar/Data bases/Models).

[P40A / GW056 ECDIS-N MODERNIZATION]: This Cost Element was transitioned from P40A to P3A to capture specific fielding of Navy ECDIS.  These funds are required to provide centralized and cost effective lifecycle sustainment and modernization of ECDIS-N solutions.  Funding is required to manage and execute ECDIS-N hardware and software upgrades and competitive efforts for follow-on ECDIS-N solution.

[P40A / GW063:  NAVIGATION CERTIFICATION]: These funds are required for conducting Navigation Certification (NAVCERT) on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms as part of fielded upgrades and tech refresh.  FY16 funds also include the initial effort for the establishment of a land-based Navigation Certification Suite lab to verify navigation equipment field changes and tech refresh interoperability with existing systems prior to shipboard installation.

[P40A / GW064: OWN SHIP SPEED (OSS) AND COURSE REPEATERS]: These funds are required for the fielding of Own Ship Speed (OSS) and Course Repeaters.

[P40A / GW065: NAVIGATION SHORESITE EQUIPMENT]: These funds are required for the procurement and NRE/ILS/Support of navigation system shoresite equipment.  Shoresite equipment does not have any associated installation costs.

[P40A / GW066: SSBN NAVIGATION SENSOR OBSOLESCENCE]: These funds are required for Procurement and NRE/ILS/Support of replacement Navigation Sensors on SSBN Platforms.

[P40A / GW068:  NAVIGATION CERTIFICATION SUITE]: This Cost Element is new from PB17 and was created by splitting Cost Element GW063 to differentiate efforts.  These funds are required for the procurement of hardware and software to maintain and upgrade a land-based Navigation Certification Suite lab to verify navigation equipment field changes and tech refresh interoperability with existing systems prior to shipboard installation.

[P40A / GW830:  PRODUCTION ENGINEERING]: These funds are required for the production engineering support of all navigation system hardware, software, and tech refresh procurements and system test and integration.  Amounts will vary from those in PB17.  Previous budget exhibits captured only production engineering costs directly associated with the individual P40A and P3A field changes and upgrades.  This Cost Element now includes indirect costs associated with the procurement and installation of individual field changes and upgrades.  These costs would include field change and upgrade support, consolidated engineering support, Program Office support, and other costs.  These costs will fluctuate with increases and decreases of overall budget, number and type of field changes and upgrades, and required support.

[P40AMOD / GW036: AN/WSN-7B]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of the AN/WSN-7B Ring Laser Gyrocompass (RLG) for SSN, MCM, and LSD platforms.  System peripherals include Sync Amps, BIT Cables, and installation kits. MCM ships require quantity (2) AN/WSN-7B per ship.  Also, provides funding for part obsolescence solutions to maintain manufacturing capability.

[P40AMOD / GW051:  ECDIS-N MODERNIZATION]: This P3A Cost Element was created by converting and renaming funding from PB17 P40A Cost Element GW051 (SCALABLE ECDIS-N ECP/FIELD CHANGE KITS) to identify individual modernization field changes and tech refresh.  These funds are for the procurement and installation of ECDIS-N hardware and software Tech Refresh on amphibious, surface and carrier platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW055: SPEED LOGS]: This Cost Element was renamed from PB17 P3A Cost Element (AN/WSN-9 SPEED LOG PROCUREMENT) as a result of expanding to encompass all non-AN/WSN-9 speed log efforts that were previously included in Cost Element GW013.  These funds are for the procurement and installation of Speed Log upgrades and Tech Refresh on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW058: NAVSSI CAPSTONE]: These funds are required for the procurement, installation, and NRE/ILS/Support of NAVSSI Capstone upgrades on LHD platforms to support Ship Self Defense System (SSDS) upgrades.

[P40AMOD / GW059:  EMERGENCY NAVIGATION LAPTOP]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Emergency Navigation Laptops (ENL) on amphibious, surface and carrier platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW060:  NEXT GENERATION FATHOMETER]: These funds are required for the procurement, installation, and NRE/ILS/support of Next Generation Fathometers to replace legacy AN/UQN-4/4A systems on amphibious, surface and carrier platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW061:  MK 27 REPLACEMENT]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of replacement for legacy MK27 Backup Heading Reference systems on amphibious, surface, and submarine platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW062:  AN/WSN-7 MODERNIZATION]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of field changes, upgrades, and Tech Refresh of AN/WSN-7 Inertial Navigation System on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.

[P40AMOD / GW067:  DIGITAL DEPTH DETECTOR]: This Cost Element is new from PB17 and is one of the P3A Cost Elements that was created from the GW013 P40A Cost Element.  These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Digital Depth Detector to replace legacy depth detectors on submarine platforms.

[P3A - 3 / GW053: AN/WSN-12]: These funds are for the procurement and installation of AN/WSN-12 Inertial Navigation Systems on surface and submarine platforms.

[P3A - 5 / GW056:  NAVY ECDIS]: This Cost Element was converted and renamed from PB17 P40A Cost Element GW056 (ECDIS-N MODERNIZATION) to P3A to identify non-recurring and recurring costs associated with the fielding of new ECDIS software.  These funds are required for the software build, procurement, and installation of Navy ECDIS hardware and software to replace legacy ECDIS-N capability on amphibious and surface platforms.

[P3A - 12 / GW069:  BOUNDARY DEFENSE CABINET]: This Cost Element is new from PB17 and was created to capture costs associated with the fielding of cybersecurity solutions.  These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Boundary Defense Cabinets on surface platforms.

Name.@footnote: GW065:  FY17 amount ($0.360) increased from PB17 ($0.000) due to overall lead time exceeding 12 months and funds contractor's annual program and manufacturing management costs.

GW066:  FY17 funding is for NRE to define Field Change Kits to address navigation sensor obsolescence in support of SSBN modernization.  FY18-19 funding is for procurement and installation of Field Change Kits on all 14 SSBN.
GW830 (Amphib):  Increase from FY17 to FY18 due to increased procurement and installation of navigation equipment (P3A) on amphibious platforms.
GW830 (Surface):  Increase from FY17 to FY18 due to increased procurement and installation of navigation equipment (P3A) on surface platforms.
GW830 (Submarine):  Increase from FY17 to FY18 due to increased procurement and installation of navigation equipment (P3A) on submarines.
PARTS OBSOLESCENCE NON-RECURRING:  Funds are provided for life-time buys, material substitutions, and other parts obsolescence solutions to maintain ability to manufacture systems.

AMPHIB AN/WSN-7 PROCUREMENT:  Systems procured in prior years as Economic Ordering Quantities based on previous fielding plans.  Current fielding plan now aligns with SSDS modernization on LSD platforms and results in later installation of systems that were procured in prior years.  FY16 installation funding includes $0.332 for DSA and $0.995 for AIT.  FY17 installation funding includes $0.203 for DSA and $0.608 for AIT.  FY19 installation funding includes $0.203 for DSA and $0.608 for AIT.
SUBMARINE AN/WSN-7B FIELD CHANGE 1:  Field Change consists of reprogramming existing circuit cards and involves minimal installation effort.  Installation costs are included in procurement costs.

Remarks.val:
Models of Systems Affected: GW036:  RING LASER GYRO NAVIGATION RING LASER GYROCOMPASS (AN/WSN-7B)
Type Modification: AN/WSN-7B

These funds are required for the procurement and installation of the AN/WSN-7B Ring Laser Gyrocompass (RLG) for SSN, MCM, and LSD platforms.  System peripherals include Sync Amps, BIT Cables, and installation kits. MCM ships require quantity (2) AN/WSN-7B per ship.  Also, provides funding for part obsolescence solutions to maintain manufacturing capability.

AN/WSN-7B Field Change 1:  Processor upgrade to Rev-N.

Name.@footnote: SURFACE INTEGRATED BRIDGE SYSTEM (IBS) HARDWARE/SOFTWARE:  Systems to be procured/delivered in FY17 to undergo land-based integration testing prior to installation in FY18.  IBS is a full ECDIS-N system that is interfaced with ship control and other ship systems and consists of additional hardware as compared to scalable systems (items 1.1, 2.2, and 3.1).

Remarks.val:
Models of Systems Affected: GW062:  AN/WSN-7 MODERNIZATION
Type Modification: AN/WSN-7 MODERNIZATION

These funds are required for the procurement and installation of field changes, upgrades, and Tech Refresh of AN/WSN-7 Inertial Navigation System on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.  

Field Change 21: Technical Insertion (TI-14).  Upgrades include SAASM GPS Receivers, improved health monitoring, Bathymetric fixes, enhanced networked sensor interfaces, TI-14 IA compliance, and SWFTS Display Standards and Conventions compliance.
Field Change 22: Upgrades include AN/WSN-7 NAV processor firmware Rev-AG and I/O processor firmware Rev-AC.
Field Change 23: Technical Insertion (TI-16).  Improvements include transition from CORBA to AMQP.
Field Change 24: Technical Insertion (TI-18).    
Field Change 26: Technical Insertion (TI-20).  
Field Change 28: Technical Insertion (TI-22).  
Submarine Shipalt 4507:  Mounting baseplate modification.
Submarine ECI 14-006 VA:  ECDU Shock Mount Mod VME Pin Replacement 
Submarine ECI (TI-10/12/14):  ECDU GVRC, RTP, and WINP firmware upgrades
Submarine ECI (TI-16/APB-17):  ECDU Time Monitoring  
Submarine ECI (TI-18/APB-19):  
Submarine ECI (TI-20/APB-21):  
Submarine TRID TBD (TI-20):  

ECI installation costs may be combined with procurement costs.

These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Digital Depth Detector to replace legacy depth detectors on submarine platforms.

Name.@footnote: NAVY ECDIS ACQUISITION DOCUMENTATION:  Support funding required for the execution of new software to replace legacy ECDIS-N Voyage Management Software (VMS).  Funding supports generation of Navy ECDIS ACAT III Program Acquisition Documentation to support award of software production contract in FY18 (item 2.1).
NAVY ECDIS SOFTWARE PRODUCTION:  Funding is for initial Navy ECDIS software production build and follow-on Navy ECDIS software maintenance builds on a two-year cycle.
SURFACE NAVY ECDIS HARDWARE:  Funds provide for the procurement and installation of hardware upgrades to replace legacy ECDIS-N capability on surface platforms.

ImplementationMethodName.val: AIT:: Installation Name: SURFACE NAVY ECDIS HARDWARE

Description.val: These funds are required for the software build, procurement, and installation of Navy ECDIS hardware and software to replace legacy ECDIS-N capability on amphibious and surface platforms.
